properties.Name: TaxBasis
properties.Description:
The basis by which revenues are considered:

Ex:
- Cash, revenues are considered earned at the time they are received in cash and expenses are considered to be incurred at the time cash is disbursed in their payment.

- Accrual, revenues are credited to the period in which they are earned regardless of when payment is received.

Columns.Name: TaxBasisId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Tax Basis.

Columns.Name: TaxBasisName
Columns.Description: The name of a Tax Basis.

Columns.Name: TaxBasisDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a Tax Basis.

Properties.Description:
The basis by which revenues are considered:

- Accrual, revenues are credited to the period in which they are earned regardless of when payment is received.
